definitions.text: hanging cloth used as a blind (especially for a window)
the manner in which fabric hangs or falls
examples: she adjusted the drape of her skirt

definitions.text: a sterile covering arranged over a patient's body during a medical examination or during surgery in order to reduce the possibility of contamination

examples: The cat draped herself on the sofa
the mountain was clothed in tropical trees

definitions.text: cover or dress loosely with cloth
examples: drape the statue with a sheet
